name: Worlds Away (Remake)
description:
Backstory:

So pretty much ~2 years ago I got into game development, and joined my first game jam. After making a game called "Worlds" away with an interesting concept (at least I think so) I took a LONG break and am just now starting to get into it again.

This game was remade for the "Improve My Game Jam 19"!

Idea:

The game is about Journie & Griffin traveling across foreign, dangerous, lands to return to each other.  The goal of the game is to beat all five levels by getting to your corresponding portal (I kinda ran out of time on development and also things outside of game dev caused me to work on it slowly). 

Controls:

To switch characters press: "space"
That's it.

Devlog:
